snippet: Serie A leaders Juventus are set to sign central midfielder Tomas Rincon from Genoa after confirming on Twitter that the Venezuelan had arrived in Turin for a medical....
lead_paragraph: Serie A leaders Juventus are set to sign central midfielder Tomas Rincon from Genoa after confirming on Twitter that the Venezuelan had arrived in Turin for a medical.

headline.main: Juventus Set to Sign Midfielder Rincon From Genoa
headline.print_headline: Juventus Set to Sign Midfielder Rincon From Genoa
